page.title: 01ASTLEY AND DUNLEY
page.content: {ASTLEY,}with its hamlets of{DUNLEY, {YARHAMPTON}and{ASTLEY BURF}(the latter just off this block), is a very scenic area of wooded slopes, orchards and farmland, crossed by small brooks. It is fighting to keep its character and resisting any encroachment by the{WYRE {FOREST DISTRICT. { STANLEY BALDWIN,}former Prime Minister, lived at{Astley Hall}and his memorial lies at the foot of the hill. Another notable inhabitant was { {FRANCES RIDLEY HAVERGAL,}a writer of hymns and religious works, whose tombstone may be seen in the churchyard. {ANDREW YARRANTON,}a 16th Century forerunner of the{Industrial {Revolution,}has left traces of his work along{Dick Brook.}He was born at{ {LARFORD}in Astley.
